title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Skills: Mobile-Based Hierarchical Mathematics Learning Design Tool Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners design mobile-friendly math learning scenarios using basic features of a hierarchical learning activity design tool.
Learners plan work problem-solving-centered mathematical learning activities by applying a separation method for concept and flow models.
Learners produce three or more mobile-optimized microlearning contents and improve them through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
